text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

product title:
Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings 1892

Product features:
Attractive Poster Reprint of magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings
Printed at 16 x 24 in.
HIgh quality, non-glossy photo paper
1892

Product description:
text.Response A: This attractive poster reproduction of a magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings is printed on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. The image measures 16x24 inches. This poster is a great addition to any magic or antique collection. It is also suitable for framing.

Product description:

Response A

This attractive poster reproduction of a magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings is printed on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. The image measures 16x24 inches. This poster is a great addition to any magic or antique collection. It is also suitable for framing.
